channel.title: Zean Hua's website
channel.description: Recent content on Zean Hua's website

item.title: A Preliminary Analysis on Toronto's COVID-19 Data by R
item.description: Abstract Human beings are suffering from a severe threaten called COVID-19. In this article, we explore a data set from the Toronto Open Data Portal. We find that the number of female patients is larger than males, and the most common source of infection are close contact and community origin, the daily confirmed case in Toronto is continously incresing now, indicating another ongoing outbreak. Our findings have implications for government and community agencies with local planning.

item.title: A Plain Markdown Post
item.description: This is a post written in plain Markdown (*.md) instead of R Markdown (*.Rmd). The major differences are: You cannot run any R code in a plain Markdown document, whereas in an R Markdown document, you can embed R code chunks (```{r}); A plain Markdown post is rendered through Blackfriday, and an R Markdown document is compiled by rmarkdown and Pandoc. There are many differences in syntax between Blackfriday’s Markdown and Pandoc’s Markdown.

item.title: About
item.description: This is a “hello world” example website for the blogdown package. The theme was forked from @jrutheiser/hugo-lithium-theme and modified by Yihui Xie.
